summary: Completed comprehensive testing of client portal enhancements and admin rewards management system for referral-based gaming transaction platform. All backend APIs and frontend components are fully functional.
passed_tests: Admin Rewards page navigation and loading
Portal Wallet Overview tab - balance breakdown display
Portal Wallet Bonus & Promo tab - progress tracker and promo redemption
Portal Wallet Cashout tab - withdrawal rules and preview
Portal Rewards page - reward history display
Promo code redemption (WELCOME10 already used scenario)
